official-title.#text:
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow
		  Indian tribes to transfer the credit for electricity produced from renewable
		  resources.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text:
Fair Allocation of Internal Revenue
			 Credit for Renewable Electricity Distribution by Indian Tribes Act of
			 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Transfer by
			 Indian tribes of credit for electricity produced from renewable
			 resources

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
(relating to production attributable to the taxpayer) is amended
			 to read as follows:
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Paragraph (3) of section 45(e) of the Internal Revenue
			 Code of 1986

text.#text:
In the case of a
				facility in which more than 1 person has an ownership interest, except to the
				extent provided in regulations prescribed by the Secretary, production from the
				facility shall be allocated among such persons in proportion to their
				respective ownership interests in the gross sales from such facility.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
in which an Indian tribe has an ownership interest in the gross sales from such
				facility, such Indian tribe may assign to any other person who has such an
				ownership interest in such facility any portion of the production from the
				facility that would (but for this subparagraph) be allocated to such Indian
				tribe. Any such assignment may be revoked only with the consent of the
and shall be made at such time and in such manner as the

text.#text: In the case of a facility described in

term.#tail:
means any Indian tribe, band, nation, pueblo, or other organized
				group or community, including any Alaska Native village or regional or village
				corporation, as defined in, or established pursuant to, the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
which is recognized as eligible
				for the special programs and services provided by the United States to Indians
				because of their status as Indians.

text.#text:
The amendment made by this section shall apply to
			 electricity produced and sold after the date of the enactment of this
			 Act.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 1602 IH: Fair Allocation of Internal Revenue Credit for Renewable Electricity Distribution by Indian Tribes Act of 2013
